definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: Scores from the individual round are used to determine which teams can compete in the team competition.
sentences.chinese: 个人赛中的得分被用来决定哪个队可以参加团体赛。

sentences.english: The individual match may be further divided into weight divisions and open category.
sentences.chinese: 个人赛则依体重区分各量级和公开量级。

sentences.english: Some examples of individual sports are swimming, running, and walking races.
sentences.chinese: 个人赛的例子是游泳，跑步，竞走。

sentences.english: Five members won medals in individual competitions.
